text: The Storm on the Sea of Galilee is an oil painting by Rembrandt van Rijn. It measures 160 × 128 cm (63 × 50.4 in). It was painted in 1633. It was in the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum, Boston. It was stolen in 1990, and it is still not found. Category:Paintings by Rembrandt van Rijn Category:1630s works
title: The Storm on the Sea of Galilee
